text: Randall Darius Jackson (born June 23, 1956) is an American record executive, television presenter and musician. He is best known as a judge on American Idol from 2002 to 2013. He was also an executive producer for MTV's America's Best Dance Crew. ==References== ==Other websites== *Randy Jackson's Hit List from Westwood One * Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:American record producers Category:African-American television personalities Category:Musicians from Louisiana Category:American bass guitarists Category:American keyboardists Category:Businesspeople from Baton Rouge, Louisiana Category:Actors from Baton Rouge, Louisiana Category:Singers from Louisiana Category:American R&B; musicians Category:American R&B; singers Category:Journey (band)
title: Randy Jackson
